Translations.Text: S. These (alphabets in this verse are) signs of Al-Quran and Kitab-un-Mobin
Hudah, and Bushrah for the Believers
those who establish As-Salat, and pay-up Az-Zakat, and they, regarding the Hereafter — they feel certainty
Verily, those who do not Believe in the Hereafter, We have made their deeds (appear) fair-seeming to them, so they wander about blindly
They are those: for them is an evil torment. And they, in the Hereafter: they become the greatest losers
And verily you: indeed, you are being bestowed Al-Quran from the Presence of All-Wise, All-Knowing

(Bring to mind) when Musa said to his family: “Verily, I have noticed a fire, soon I will approach you therefrom with some information or I come to you with a burning brand so that you may warm yourself.”
So when he came to it he was called that: “Blessed has been made that whosoever is in the ‘fire’, and who is in its precincts. And glorified be Allah, the Nourisher-Sustainer to the worlds
O Musa! Verily, it is I, Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise

And put you down your rod!" But when he marked it (that) it moves, as if it (is) a snake, he turned being one who turns his back and did not return. (It was said): “O Musa! Fear not. Verily, the Messengers fear not in My Presence
except that who has done wrong, (and) afterwards has brought in replacement good after evil; then surely, I am Oft-Forgiving, continuously Merciful
And put your hand into your bosom, it will come forth white without any disease. (These are) among the nine credentials to Firaun and his nation. Surely, they are a nation of those who are Fasiqun
So when Our enlightening Credentials came to them, they said: “This is manifest magic.”
